gov.nasa.jpl.mudrod.ontology.process

Class LocalOntology

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpl.mudrod.ontology.process.LocalOntology
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ontology

    public class LocalOntology
extends Object
implements Ontology
    The LocalOntology implementation enables us to work with Ontology files whcih are cached locally and available on the runtime classpath e.g. in src/main/resource/ontology/.... From here we can test and iterate on how use of ontology can enhance search.

      • synonyms

        public Iterator synonyms(String queryKeyPhrase)
        Retreives synonyms for an given phrase if the phrase is present in the ontology
        Specified by:
        synonyms in interface Ontology
        Parameters:
        queryKeyPhrase - an input string representing a phrase for which we wish to obtain synonyms.
        Returns:
        an Iterator containing synonyms string tokens or an empty if no synonyms exist for the given queryKeyPhrase.

      • retrieve

        public Map<org.apache.jena.ontology.OntResource,String> retrieve(String label)
        A basic lookup function for retrieving keys (phrases or tokens) from the ontology search terms map. Right now only exact lookups will retrieve a result... this could be improved by using some advanced parsing logic... such as Lucene query parser.
        Parameters:
        label - the label (phrases or tokens) to retrieve from the ontology search terms map.
        Returns:
        an Map if there are match(es) or an empty HashMap if there are no matches.
